sources.title: Born for Hell (1976)
sources.description: Loosely based on the notorious Richard Speck murders, this is the grim tale of a disturbed Vietnam vet returning home via Belfast, who invades a house shared by eight nurses and proceeds to terrorize and murder them. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/born-for-hell-1976/

metadata.Plot: Loosely based on the notorious Richard Speck murders, this is the grim tale of a disturbed Vietnam vet returning home via Belfast, who invades a house shared by eight nurses and proceeds to terrorize and murder them.
metadata.Writer: F.G. Ranger, Denis Héroux, Clenn Wood
metadata.Actors: Mathieu Carrière, Debra Berger, Christine Boisson
